author: IGN
description:
Discover how to unlock the Necro Fluid Gauntlet, the brand-new Wonder Weapon in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Zombies – Ashes of the Damned. This full step-by-step guide walks you through every requirement, every location, and every mechanic involved in assembling one of the strongest weapons in BO7. From powering up Blackwater Lake, Ashwood, and Van Dorn Farm, to defeating the Uber Klaus and restoring Friendly Klaus, to carrying the Aether Barrel across the map with Tessie – the entire Wonder Weapon quest is broken down clearly and efficiently.

In this walkthrough, we’ll show you where to find Ted’s Head, how to activate Tessie, how to complete all power pumps, how to summon and defeat the Über Klaus core, how to upgrade Klaus, how to fix the Cosmodrome machine, and how to match the farm symbols to awaken the mysterious Aether Box. Finally, you’ll learn how to survive the green trial and claim the Necro Fluid Gauntlet, a poison-filled powerhouse that buffs your health and destroys zombi
title: COD: Black Ops 7 Zombies - How to Get the Necro Fluid Gauntlet (Wonder Weapon)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the gameplay overview for Rainbow Six Siege X: Operation Tenfold Pursuit Operator. The new season will introduce a new weapon — the PMR90A2 DMR — for Thatcher, Capitão, Nøkk, and Hibana; this new DMR will be exclusive to the Operation Tenfold Pursuit Premium Battle Pass for two weeks, after which it will be accessible to all players. 
Operation Tenfold Pursuit is also delivering an update for hard breaches and select Defenders. The Fortress map will be fully reworked and modernized, with Theme Park getting modernized as well. Plus, there will also be 10th Anniversary events running in December to celebrate this major milestone in Siege history.
Operation Tenfold Pursuit is coming to Rainbow Six Siege X on December 2.

#IGN #gaming
title: Rainbow Six Siege X: Operation Tenfold Pursuit - Gameplay Overview

author: IGN
description: Don't miss 'Team Rainbow's Last Mission' animated trailer for Rainbow Six Siege X Operation Tenfold Pursuit, the tactical first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft. Team Rainbow is deployed to intercept Phobos' explosives. This is their last chance, their last mission, and they will see it through, no matter what. Operation Tenfold Pursuit will be revealed on November 16, 2025.
title: Rainbow Six Siege X - Official 'Team Rainbow's Last Mission' Animated Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch a first glimpse of the highly anticipated epic adventure Varanasi, SS Rajamouli's follow-up project to Academy Award-winning film RRR, starring Mahesh Babu, Priyanka Chopra, and Prithviraj Sukumaran. 

Credit: SRI DURGA ARTS and SHOWING BUSINESS
title: Varanasi - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer (2027)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Formula 1 'F1 Cosmetic Team Set’ Teaser Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale developed by Epic Games. The Formula 1 collaboration will include branded outfits, gliders, and pickaxes that feature team branding from all 10 Formula 1 teams. 
The ‘F1 Cosmetic Team Set’ goes live in-game on Thursday, November 20, ahead of the highly anticipated 2025 Las Vegas Grand Prix. 
Formula 1 cosmetics drop in the Item Shop: Nov 20, 7 PM ET.

#IGN #gaming
title: Fortnite x Formula 1- Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
For over 20 years, Edgar Wright has been one of the most genre-defying visual stylists of his filmmaking generation, with movies like Scott Pilgrim vs. The World, Baby Driver, Last Night in Soho, and of course, the beloved Cornetto Trilogy (Shaun of the Dead, Hot Fuzz, and The World's End). With his new adaptation of Stephen King's The Running Man, Wright looks back on a career well-shot, picking some of the shots that have meant the most to him across his first seven films and concluding by discussing the shot from The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly that makes him "believe in the power of cinema."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NEG_o7C0P8k&list=PL1AXWu-gGX6IUaJF0TSx7ZkFbAne7BJhe&index=1&t=34s&pp=iAQB

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nl0WAV4vzN0&list=PL1AXWu-gGX6IUaJF0TSx7ZkFbAne7BJhe&index=2&pp=iAQB

#IGN #Movies
title: From Shaun of the Dead to The Running Man | Edgar Wright Breaks Down His Most Iconic Shots
